artist: Author: Dmytri Kleiner, et al.; Publisher: Idiosyntactix Strategic Arts & Science Alliance, Toronto
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription: Rear cover, black ink pen: To / Foy from / sashs. for a good / memory. / If good things can happen, / then they will happen. / Thank you. Oct 18-2005 / small Press Boat Fair / Toronto. / (illeg. signiture)
medium: Xerography, color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress, bound volume
title: The One Page Bible: Symbiosis Magazine Issue 2
